title: BandersGuru
summary: Try to get recruited as a Software Engineer at Carts-Guru!

initial.story: You are in front of the Carts-Guru office at 880 Harrison in San Francisco

choices.reason: You knock and then open the door.

choices.line: Run away in the opposite direction
choices.reason: You ran away and improved your cardio but you're still out of a job.

1.story: You meet a group of Carts-Guru's finest: the Software Engineers!

choices.line: Start doing the backpack-kid dance to impress them.
choices.reason: You start dancing. Suddenly, everybody dances too! But you can't stop, and everybody else either. You die of exhaustion.

choices.line: Tell them that Android is clearly better than Apple and that whoever would argue the contrary is completely insane.
choices.reason: You mumble something about Android being a superior mobile OS. After a 5 minutes long heated discussion, Engineers try to kill each other with their laptops. You get iKilled by a Macbook.
They all warmly welcome you and after a bit of chit-chat and a coffee, they invite you to follow them to a conference room for your inteview.

2.story: You follow them to a conference room. People sit around the table.

choices.line: Go on the table and do yoga
choices.reason: You assume a yogi position on the table and start humming and meditating. After 4 hours of this, you reach Nirvana, but everybody's gone.
You get attacked by some spiders that live under the table and die.
You casually proceed to sit on the CTO's lap. He looks at you REALLY weirdly during the entire interview.
You sit and start interviewing. It goes surprisingly good! You get recruited as a Software Engineer!

title: BandersFirstDay
summary: Navigate through your first day on the job!

initial.story: You wake up to your alarm clock, you look at the time and it says 7:00AM.

choices.line: Get up from bed and get ready for work
choices.reason: You shower, get breakfast and leave the house by 8:00AM
You wake up at noon and miss your first day. You're very well rested, but you get fired!

1.story: You get to the office and greet everyone then sit at your new desk.

choices.line: Get on YouTube, and proceed to watch videos all day.
choices.reason: You saw an amazing video of a lion tamer. You quit and join the circus!

choices.line: Drink some whisky from a bottle you find at your desk.
choices.reason: You start throwing up. You find out later, that bottle belonged to the the guy you replaced and he liked mixing weird things with his alcohol.

choices.line: Look at the onboarding materials and get to know the codebase.
choices.reason: You feel productive, and got some work done.

2.story: Time flies by and it's already time to go home!

choices.line: Rush out the of the office!
choices.reason: You're so excited to leave, you don't realize there are glass doors and hit them running. The glass breaks, and you get taken to the hospital.

choices.line: Hide in the closet to surprise the next person who opens it.
choices.reason: You lock yourself in and no one opens the door till the next day. You're now known in the office as the closet-guy.

choices.line: Invite the cute girl at work out for a drink.
choices.reason: You go out for a drink and she invites you home. The girl turns out to be a serial killer who targets new software engineers. You die.
After a long day of work, you eat dinner and watch some Netflix and fall asleep by 11PM.
